about_the_game:
Infested: Space Colony is an intense real-time action top-down shooter in a dimly-lit environment where aliens roam in shadowy darkness. Explore various sections of the colony ship, grab a weapon, blast aliens to bits, obtain supplies and carry out crucial tasks on behalf of the crew. Watch your back. Hunt down aliens before they hunt you down.

Theme:
Enter Jim Raldo, a space engineer trapped in Promenade, a colony ship infested with malignant alien species as you battle your way in darkness lit only by your head torch. With aliens hiding in the dark you have to rely on quick and decisive action to survive as you make you make your way from one section of the ship to the next. Discover what truly happened on Titan and unveil the sinister force that led to the infestation abroad the colony ship. Understand the choices you make will have an effect on the final outcome of the story. Infested: Space Colony brings you back to the fond memories of a classic theme of gun-toting, hack-and-slash, alien-hunting in a colony ship.

Game Features:
1. One-hit kill top down shooter with varied selection of random weapons.
2. Twenty two (22) sections of colony ship waiting to be explored, from docking bay to mess hall, to terrarium and all the way to the captain's bridge.
3. Each section of the ship comes with its own set of challenges.
4. A good mix of aliens and human enemies.
5. Multiple missions and endings.

  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

  • Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster
